personalInfo.name: Prateek Jain
personalInfo.title: Senior Web Engineer
personalInfo.bio: Hi there, I'm Prateek, a full-stack developer who loves to design and build digital experiences. I specialize in creating scalable web applications with modern technologies and intuitive user interfaces.

featuredProjects.title: Brokersify
featuredProjects.description: Comprehensive real estate platform connecting users with top-rated local agents and providing brokers a CRM tool to manage leads effectively.

featuredProjects.title: HookFlo
featuredProjects.description: Modern workflow automation platform that streamlines business processes with intelligent task management and real-time collaboration features.

otherProjects.description: Dynamic QR management SaaS web app with time-expiring dynamic QR codes and comprehensive analytics dashboard.

featuredBlog.title: #55 to 95: Performance Journey of Brokersify
featuredBlog.description: Boosting Brokersify! How We Consistently Hitting 95+ Performance Score for Brokersify.

articles.title: Building Scalable React Applications with TypeScript
